name: Getting Between Dallas's and Houston's Airports - Bus/Train/Transit Experience (DFW - DAL/IAH - HOU)
description:
Thanks for joining me for a unique adventure as we connect between Texas's busiest airports in Dallas and Houston!

Today's video covers what you need to know when you have to get between Bush Intercontinental and Houston Hobby, as well as from Dallas Love Field to Dallas Fort Worth International Airport and back!

The information provided in this video is accurate and current both when I recorded this in October 2021, as well as at the time of upload in June 2022. Prices and routing are subject to change, so double check the websites for each transit authority if it's been a while since this video!

Check the chapters if you're interested in something specific!

Finally, let me know where you'd like to see next! Stay tuned for new flight and airport videos every two weeks!

The contents of this video and its production are not endorsed by any entity portrayed therein, and none of the entities provided any input or compensation in the production of this video.

If you'd like to speak with me directly about the contents of this video or my channel, you can reach me at milesbyfoot at gmail.com.

Thumbnail by my artist wife, Beth!

IG: bethmclain.art
Twitter: Marshmallowbat

00:00 - Intro
00:30 - Houston Transit (IAH - HOU)
02:20 - Houston Transit (HOU - IAH)
03:10 - Dallas Transit (DAL - DFW)
04:15 - Dallas Transit (DFW - DAL)
05:15 - Conclusion
06:00 - End Screen

Thanks again for watching, and keep moving forward!

#dallas #dfw #dfwairport #airport #aviation #travel #dal #iah #houston #hou #publictransport #train #bus

Nikon D3200 (18-55/55-200mm)

IrfanView

ridemetro.org (Houston Metro Bus)
